text: William Lyon (March 9, 1923 â€“ May 22, 2020) was a major general of the United States Air Force. He was Commander of the United States Air Force Reserve Command. As chief of Air Force Reserve, Lyon was the principal adviser on Reserve matters to the Air Force Chief of Staff. He was born in Los Angeles, California. Lyon died on May 22, 2020 in Coto de Caza, California at the age of 97.William Lyon, Orange County homebuilder and civic leader, dies at 97 ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American generals Category:People from Los Angeles Category:Military people from California
title: William Lyon (general)
